name: tm54
effect: Teaches False Swipe to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches False Swipe to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
